name: Settings
description: Open the Settings window

name: Close Window
description: Close the current Simsapa window

name: Quit Simsapa
description: Quit the application

name: Sutta Search
description: Open a new Sutta Search window

name: Focus Search Input
description: Move focus to the search input field

name: Next Search Area
description: Cycle to the next search area (Suttas, Dictionary, Library)

name: Previous Result
description: Select the previous search result in the sidebar

name: Next Result
description: Select the next search result in the sidebar

name: Find in Page
description: Open the find bar to search within the current tab

name: Find Next in Page
description: Find the next occurrence in the current tab

name: Find Previous in Page
description: Find the previous occurrence in the current tab

name: Toggle Reading Mode
description: Toggle between reading mode and normal view

name: Close Tab
description: Close the current tab

name: Pin/Unpin Tab
description: Pin or unpin the current tab

name: Toggle Tab List
description: Show or hide the tab list popup

name: Previous Tab
description: Switch to the previous tab

name: Next Tab
description: Switch to the next tab

name: Previous Sidebar Tab
description: Switch to the previous sidebar tab

name: Next Sidebar Tab
description: Switch to the next sidebar tab

name: Scroll Up
description: Scroll the page up in the current tab

name: Scroll Down
description: Scroll the page down in the current tab

name: Scroll Half Page Up
description: Scroll half a page up in the current tab

name: Scroll Half Page Down
description: Scroll half a page down in the current tab

name: Scroll Page Up
description: Scroll a page up in the current tab

name: Scroll Page Down
description: Scroll a page down in the current tab

name: Scroll To Top
description: Scroll to the top of the page in the current tab

name: Scroll To Bottom
description: Scroll to the bottom of the page in the current tab
